DataRobot| Engineering | Boston, MA (Remote OK)| Full time

Predictive analytics in the cloud! DataRobot is a predictive analytics platform for data scientists to build and deploy accurate predictive models in a fraction of the time it takes today. By harnessing the power of massively parallel computing, DataRobot builds and refines 1000s of possible models using R and Python to find the best ones in just hours.
